questions.question: What does Phoebe want to check in yesterday's daily news?
options: The weather forecast
Her horoscope
The sports section
The entertainment news
questions.correct_answer: Her horoscope
questions.explanation: Phoebe wants to check if her horoscope was right.

questions.question: What is Monica's initial reaction when she sees the guy behind them?
options: She waves at him
She ignores him
She turns away and tells Phoebe not to look
She goes to talk to him
questions.correct_answer: She turns away and tells Phoebe not to look
questions.explanation: Monica grabs Phoebe and turns her away, telling her not to look at the guy.

questions.question: What happens to the guy after Monica shouts 'Woo-woo!'?
options: He turns around and starts talking to them
He ignores them and keeps walking
He gets hit by a truck
He runs away
questions.correct_answer: He gets hit by a truck
questions.explanation: After Monica shouts 'Woo-woo!', the guy turns around, startled, and gets hit by a truck.

questions.question: What is the name of the book written by Nora Tyler Bing that Rachel loves?
options: Euphoria Unbound
Euphoria at Midnight
The Love Stick
A Woman Undone
questions.correct_answer: Euphoria at Midnight
questions.explanation: Rachel tells Mrs. Bing that she loves her books, especially 'Euphoria at Midnight'.

questions.question: Why does Ross kiss Mrs. Bing?
options: Because he is in love with her
Because he is drunk and upset about Rachel and Paolo
Because she is a great writer
Because he wants to make Chandler jealous
questions.correct_answer: Because he is drunk and upset about Rachel and Paolo
questions.explanation: Ross kisses Mrs. Bing because he is drunk and upset about Rachel and Paolo's relationship.

questions.question: What is the name of the song Phoebe sings at Central Perk?
options: You Don't Have to Be Awake to Be My Man
Smelly Cat
Sticky Shoes
Ode to a Pubic Hair
questions.correct_answer: You Don't Have to Be Awake to Be My Man
questions.explanation: Phoebe sings a song about the Coma Guy at Central Perk.

questions.question: What is the Coma Guy's reaction when he wakes up and sees Monica and Phoebe?
options: He is grateful and thanks them for taking care of him
He is confused and doesn't remember them
He is angry and tells them to leave him alone
He is casual and says 'See you around'
questions.correct_answer: He is casual and says 'See you around'
questions.explanation: The Coma Guy wakes up, sees Monica and Phoebe, and casually says 'See you around'.

questions.question: What does Chandler tell his mom after she kisses Ross?
options: That he is happy for her and Ross
That he is upset and doesn't want her to see Ross again
That he wants her to grow up and be a better mom
That he forgives her and wants to move on
questions.correct_answer: That he wants her to grow up and be a better mom
questions.explanation: Chandler tells his mom that she needs to grow up and be a better mom.

questions.question: What is the name of Rachel's book that she is writing?
options: A Woman Undone
Euphoria Unbound
The Love Stick
A Love So Strong
questions.correct_answer: A Woman Undone
questions.explanation: Rachel is writing a book called 'A Woman Undone'.

questions.question: What does Monica get for the Coma Guy while Phoebe gets him an Etch-a-Sketch?
options: A foot massager
A new pair of shoes
A book by Mrs. Bing
A teddy bear
questions.correct_answer: A foot massager
questions.explanation: Monica gets the Coma Guy a foot massager, while Phoebe gets him an Etch-a-Sketch.

questions.question: What is Phoebe's reaction when the Coma Guy says 'See you around'?
options: She is happy and thanks him for his kindness
She is upset and feels used
She is casual and says 'See you around' back
She is angry and tells him to leave her alone
questions.correct_answer: She is upset and feels used
questions.explanation: Phoebe is upset when the Coma Guy says 'See you around' because she feels used and unappreciated.

questions.question: What does Joey think about Ross kissing Mrs. Bing?
options: He thinks it's okay and that Ross is a great guy
He thinks it's wrong and that Ross should apologize
He thinks it's funny and that Ross is a jerk
He thinks it's a code violation and that Ross should be punished
questions.correct_answer: He thinks it's a code violation and that Ross should be punished
questions.explanation: Joey thinks that Ross has broken a code by kissing Mrs. Bing and that he should be punished for it.

questions.question: What does Mrs. Bing say to Ross after he kisses her?
options: That she loves him and wants to be with him
That she is sorry and that it was a mistake
That she thinks he is a great guy and a hero
That she knows how to write men that women fall in love with
questions.correct_answer: That she knows how to write men that women fall in love with
questions.explanation: Mrs. Bing tells Ross that she knows how to write men that women fall in love with.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's kiss with Mrs. Bing, according to Joey?
options: Because Ross is in love with Mrs. Bing
Because Ross is drunk and upset about Rachel and Paolo
Because Ross wants to make Chandler jealous
Because Ross wants to prove a point
questions.correct_answer: Because Ross is drunk and upset about Rachel and Paolo
questions.explanation: Joey thinks that Ross kissed Mrs. Bing because he was drunk and upset about Rachel and Paolo.

questions.question: What does Chandler do after finding out about Ross's kiss with his mom?
options: He forgives Ross and tells him it's okay
He gets angry and yells at Ross
He talks to his mom about the situation
He ignores the situation and doesn't do anything
questions.correct_answer: He gets angry and yells at Ross
questions.explanation: Chandler gets angry and yells at Ross after finding out about the kiss.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do for the Coma Guy while he is in the hospital?
options: She reads to him
She sings to him
She shaves him
All of the above
questions.correct_answer: All of the above
questions.explanation: Phoebe reads to the Coma Guy, sings to him, and shaves him while he is in the hospital.

questions.question: What is the name of the restaurant where the gang goes to eat with Mrs. Bing?
options: Central Perk
Monica's Apartment
A Mexican Restaurant
A Italian Restaurant
questions.correct_answer: A Mexican Restaurant
questions.explanation: The gang goes to a Mexican restaurant to eat with Mrs. Bing.

questions.question: What does Mrs. Bing say about her book 'Euphoria Unbound' on TV?
options: That it's a romance novel
That it's a thriller
That it's a memoir
That it's about her experiences with men
questions.correct_answer: That it's about her experiences with men
questions.explanation: Mrs. Bing talks about her book 'Euphoria Unbound' and her experiences with men on TV.

questions.question: What is the reaction of the gang when they find out about Ross's kiss with Mrs. Bing?
options: They are all shocked and upset
They are all happy and supportive
They are all indifferent and don't care
They are all amused and think it's funny
questions.correct_answer: They are all shocked and upset
questions.explanation: The gang is shocked and upset when they find out about Ross's kiss with Mrs. Bing.

questions.question: What does Joey say about his mother, Gloria Tribbiani?
options: That she is not a handsome woman
That she was a handsome woman in her day
That she is a great cook
That she is a terrible mother
questions.correct_answer: That she was a handsome woman in her day
questions.explanation: Joey says that his mother, Gloria Tribbiani, was a handsome woman in her day.

questions.question: What is the reason for Chandler's conversation with his mom at the end of the episode?
options: To talk about his feelings and their relationship
To apologize for Ross's kiss
To discuss her book and writing
To make plans for her trip to Lisbon
questions.correct_answer: To talk about his feelings and their relationship
questions.explanation: Chandler talks to his mom about their relationship and his feelings at the end of the episode.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Chandler after Chandler finds out about the kiss?
options: That he is sorry and it was a mistake
That he is not sorry and it was worth it
That it was just a joke and didn't mean anything
That it was a Greek play and they were just rehearsing
questions.correct_answer: That it was just a joke and didn't mean anything
questions.explanation: Ross tries to downplay the situation and tells Chandler that it was just a joke and didn't mean anything.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do when she sees Monica sneaking out of the Coma Guy's hospital room?
options: She confronts Monica about her actions
She ignores Monica and continues singing
She runs out of the room to follow Monica
She stays in the room and talks to the Coma Guy
questions.correct_answer: She runs out of the room to follow Monica
questions.explanation: Phoebe runs out of the room to follow Monica when she sees her sneaking out of the Coma Guy's hospital room.

questions.question: What is the Coma Guy's first question when he wakes up and sees Monica and Phoebe?
options: Who are you?
What happened to me?
Where am I?
What's going on?
questions.correct_answer: Who are you?
questions.explanation: The Coma Guy asks Monica and Phoebe 'Who are you?' when he wakes up.

questions.question: What does Monica say to the Coma Guy when he says 'See you around'?
options: That she is happy to see him go
That she is upset and feels used
That she wants to see him again
That she doesn't care about him
questions.correct_answer: That she is upset and feels used
questions.explanation: Monica is upset when the Coma Guy says 'See you around' because she feels used and unappreciated.

questions.question: What does Joey do when he finds out about Ross's kiss with Mrs. Bing?
options: He tells Chandler about the kiss
He keeps the secret and doesn't tell anyone
He gets angry and yells at Ross
He makes a joke about it and teases Ross
questions.correct_answer: He tells Chandler about the kiss
questions.explanation: Joey tells Chandler about Ross's kiss with Mrs. Bing.

questions.question: What does Mrs. Bing say to Ross about her writing?
options: That she writes about her personal experiences
That she writes about romance and love
That she writes about science fiction and fantasy
That she writes about mystery and thriller
questions.correct_answer: That she writes about romance and love
questions.explanation: Mrs. Bing talks to Ross about her writing and how she writes about romance and love.

questions.question: What is the final scene of the episode?
options: The gang at Central Perk talking about Ross's kiss
Monica and Phoebe at the hospital with the Coma Guy
Chandler and his mom talking about their relationship
Rachel handing out copies of her book to the gang
questions.correct_answer: Rachel handing out copies of her book to the gang
questions.explanation: The final scene of the episode is Rachel handing out copies of her book to the gang.

questions.question: What does Chandler's mom say to him about Ross's kiss?
options: That she is sorry and it was a mistake
That she is not sorry and it was worth it
That it was just a joke and didn't mean anything
That she knows how to write men that women fall in love with
questions.correct_answer: That she is sorry and it was a mistake
questions.explanation: Chandler's mom apologizes to him about her kiss with Ross and says it was a mistake.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Chandler about his kiss with Mrs. Bing?
options: That it was a mistake and he is sorry
That it was worth it and he would do it again
That it was just a joke and didn't mean anything
That there were two people involved and it takes two to tango
questions.correct_answer: That there were two people involved and it takes two to tango
questions.explanation: Ross tells Chandler that there were two people involved in the kiss and it takes two to tango.

questions.question: What does Joey think about Ross's excuse for kissing Mrs. Bing?
options: That it's a good excuse and he understands
That it's a bad excuse and he doesn't believe it
That it's a funny excuse and he laughs about it
That it's a complicated excuse and he doesn't care
questions.correct_answer: That it's a bad excuse and he doesn't believe it
questions.explanation: Joey doesn't believe Ross's excuse for kissing Mrs. Bing and thinks it's a bad excuse.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do when she is at the hospital with the Coma Guy?
options: She reads to him
She sings to him
She shaves him
She talks to him
questions.correct_answer: All of the above
questions.explanation: Phoebe reads to the Coma Guy, sings to him, shaves him, and talks to him while he is in the hospital.

options: Racquetball
Basketball
Football
Baseball
questions.correct_answer: Racquetball
questions.explanation: Ross and Joey were supposed to play racquetball.

options: That he is happy for her and Ross
That he is upset and doesn't want her to see Ross again
That he wants her to grow up and be a better mom
That he forgives her and wants to move on
questions.correct_answer: That he wants her to grow up and be a better mom
